title: Ticket #3364: Don't lookup CONDOR_GAHP when using grid-type batch
description: For grid-type batch jobs, when consulting the config file for the path to the blahp, we check <batch-type>_GAHP in addition to BATCH_GAHP for backwards-compatibility (BATCH_GAHP was added in 7.7.6 as part of #2670). We don't want to do this when using the blahp to submit into HTCondor, as CONDOR_GAHP points to the C-GAHP, which we don't want to use.
check_ins:
2012-Dec-06 11:52   Check-in [34314]: Version history for grid-type batch and CONDOR_GAHP bug fix. #3364 (By Jaime Frey )
2012-Dec-06 11:49   Check-in [34313]: Don't lookup CONDOR_GAHP when using grid-type batch. #3364 We're looking for old parameters that name the blahp, but CONDOR_GAHP names the c-gahp. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
